content.response: Some people did not like the sushi cat because they did not think it would be actually useful. Future iterations should test via an A/B testing to understand the efficacy of the virtual pet.
Many assessments found that they could not find our lo-fi prototypes. Future iterations should create a better visual hierarchy to help the viewers spot all the l-fi prototypes.

The main feedback from the co-founder of the startup was that we should think about retention and engagement for many of these mental health apps. It is pivotal to create apps that are non-intrusive nor predatory but can be scalable for a greater public.
